reviewText: Pickle Pickin'This was a little gem of a video. So often I get videos for teaching religious ed and am disappointed, but this one surprised me. It is funny, compelling, and surprising. Mostly inspirational. Actually it's a great video not only for my older students (6th grade through 11th grade), but for the teachers. It reminds us about the real values of living and supporting each other on our journey to heaven.

I have seen this three times, and am still deeply touched to move out of my normal living into a lifestyle of telling lost people the truth that will set them free.  Humorously & interestingly presented & understandable even for young children.
